talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Geraint$
Your face already looks ugly as it is and now you're looking even more ugly when you look so glum. Hmph!

$Geraint$
So what took you so long?! Did the humans imprison you or something?

${user_nick}$
(Tell him what happened)

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9561_qu_01.ogg}
(Geraint frowns)
A mission to track Feder down?!! Then when do we avenge Argenta?!! We need to find the Black Knight first!! Hey, you're Argenta's friend, aren't you?!

${user_nick}$
There's no way I can find him even if I wanted to. It's not like I have a good sense of smell like you, and we don't have much time. We should focus on the task on hand for now. Don't you want to save this world too Geraint?

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9561_qu_02.ogg}
What? Save this… world?! That's Argenta's specialty, not mine! I'm just in charge of killing any enemies I find! Whatever and whoever it may be! But… what does that got to do with this?

${user_nick}$
…(I probably need years to make this kid understand that Velskud is not our enemy and explain why Argenta made such a decision… It was something even I couldn't understand easily… But there's no time to pamper him. I should stay strong.)

${user_nick}$
Geraint, you know I want to travel with you. But if you keep being so stubborn, you leave me with no choice. You should chase after the Black Knight Velskud on your own. I won't go with you.

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9561_qu_03.ogg}
….(Geraint stares at you like he's at a loss for words) Are you sure you're Argenta's friend?

${user_nick}$
I'm doing this precisely because I'm her friend.
Argenta stopped the poison from Mistland and weakened Feder with her life.
I just don't want to make her sacrifice go to nothing. Even when no one in this world recognizes what she did!!!

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9561_qu_04.ogg}
…!!(Geraint's eyes widen with surprise) Hey… Are you angry...?

${user_nick}$
(Ah… was my voice too loud…? I didn't mean to sound angry...) No, it's not that...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>How can I explain all that in words...</html>
<html>Of course I am!</html>
<html>I can't explain my feelings with words...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9561_qu_05.ogg}
….(He is still staring into your eyes)Hey… are you sad that Argenta's dead?

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9561_qu_06.ogg}
…….(Geraint thinks for a while and opens his mouth)All right, I'll come with you.

$Geraint$
…(Geraint snatches the map from your hands before you can say anything)
Hey, isn't this Anu Arendel? Are you gonna go from here? What are these red marks? Magic?

${user_nick}$
What red marks? Huh…? What is this? (There really are strange red marks that were not there a minute earlier… The moment you touch the red marks with your finger, a voice is suddenly heard from the air...)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Huh? Who are you...?</html>
<html>Anybody there?</html>
<html>Geraint, are you playing games with me…?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$????${sound:npc_Rubinart_9561_qu_01.ogg}
…I'm waiting for you, my friend.

$Geraint$
(Geraint stares at you like you're crazy) What are you saying? I didn't hear anything. You heard something?

${user_nick}$
(The voice was clear enough…)
Erm… Nothing. The closest place we can go to is… Crossroad of Hesitant Past through the Forest of Little Shadows.

${user_nick}$
(A book...)

$Geraint$
Go to the Crossroad of Hesitant Past through the Forest of Little Shadows…? That sounds like a place in the Pokegoblin Adventures... N-no I'm not a child anymore so I don't watch that now... Let's go now!! (Geraint shakes his head and leads the way. What made him behave so well? Though it's suspicious, follow him)

$Geraint$
This place is a wasteland… Hey, there's something over there.
(Geraint points to a book nearby. Click on the book)

$Geraint$
{user_nick}!! I smell a dragon from this book… Could this belong to Feder??
There was a book at the place with the red mark on the map!!

${user_nick}$
(Take the book from him, dust off the covers and read the title)
Hmm… Rubinart's… What? Isn't Rubinart the name of the Red Dragon?

$Geraint$
What are you talking about? Feder is the Red Dragon.

${user_nick}$
No, the name I heard from Iona was Rubinart. He said the old Red Dragon he knew was called Rubinart and the current one is called Feder, so the two of them must be different.

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9561_qu_07.ogg}
(Geraint seems irritated)Are you gonna keep talking about Chaos Dragon in front an Ancient Dragon?! Iona is a Chaos Dragon too! Just read the book anyway.

${user_nick}$
But Iona's different. He was a fragment of Chaos Dragon, but he wasn't corrupted. And he was kind-hearted like you… actually much more than you.

$Geraint$
You… Grrr…(Geraint glowers at you) Why do you keep siding with the Chaos Dragon? Do you even belong to this world? You know what happened to this world because of Chaos… Wait, how did you end up with Chaos Dragon's power anyway? You're suspicious!!

${user_nick}$
(He was there when I explained about this to Argenta… But anyway, I should kindly explain it to him again. I spent much time with Iona, seeing many things, discussing different issues and talking about humans... Iona was impressed by the power of humans... Iona was a being made out of his soul and he disappeared after giving his powers to me...)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You have such a negative image of me.</html>
<html>I think I explained this to Argenta last time too... (He wasn't paying attention)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
…You mean Chaos did that…? He asked you to protect this world and gave you his powers to do that…? And you travelled with him?? You didn't bully him into it or threaten him with force? Are you sure he didn't give up his power when he couldn't stand the harrassment from you??

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Hello....?</html>
<html>Er... Geraint?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
…What…?(Geraint pulls his hair like he doesn't understand) No way. We're talking about Chaos Dragon here. My enemy. The one who's threatening this world! You mean he isn't my enemy...?? (Geraint sits down quietly with his head in his hands. The deafening silence is scary.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Argenta used to scold you too? (I knew it!)</html>
<html>So Argenta scolded you last time! (She must have!)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
(He suddenly stands up)I don't know! My mind's in a mess right now. I won't get any answers even if I think about it. If I'm dazed out for too long, I'll get scolded again too. I'll just think about it later.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(So he used to get scolded)</html>
<html>Hey, don't try to read my mind.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Well, sometimes... when I made trouble... Wait, no!!! Argenta didn't scold me. She said I couldn't do certain things but she didn't scold me or say things like "there he goes again..." or "I just can't stand this kid," like what your eyes are saying right now!!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Ah okay... (What should I do with this kiddo)</html>
<html>I see... (A dragon is acting like a 7-year-old next door. What a nightmare...)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Anyway, I didn't do anything that might get me a scolding! So I have no reason to hear that from you.
Think about it, what can YOU teach a Gold Dragon like me? Huh?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>...Stop reading such unproductive books.</html>
<html>What's attractivityness? You mean attractiveness?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
I read it in [~Super Secret~ Face Reading Expert~].
It said beware of people with eyes like you. People may drown in your attractivityness.

$Geraint$
Wh-whatever! That's not what's important. You should read the book if you've found it! You said it's Red Dragon who wrote it. Come on, read it, stupid {user_nick}.

${user_nick}$
(There are so many points I want to argue with him on. I should just read the book... Oh, it is handwritten with neat and highly artistic handwriting)

$Rubinart's Foreword$
It is a very unusual thing for me to write, but I must record this down for my friend who will be reading this someday. If I don't leave anything behind, I wouldn't have any hopes left. Not just me, but the whole world wouldn't have any hopes left.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Could it be that the Red Dragon and Feder were friends...?!)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Rubinart's Foreword$
This is going to be a long story... But I must write it down about my dear human friend, Conqueror King Feder, and his strong comrades who followed him... About the times we lived in... and about me... First, I will start with Feder, who is probably the most famous one.

$Rubinart's Book$
Feder wasn't cut out to be the Conqueror King right from the beginning.
His reputations were rock bottom at first. Everyone picked on his background and his character wherever he went. Especially his background...

$Rubinart's Book$
He was a slave from a country called Lunascent. Though he was a slave, his strength and talent couldn't be hidden. He wasn't lazy in training the strong body he was born with, and though he was a mere slave, the number of hours he practiced surpassed the general even at a very young age.

$Rubinart's Book$
With the skills he honed, he escaped Lunascent and became a knight in this country. Everyone was sarcastic about how much a knight with a slave background could do... But surprisingly, he knew a lot of things, and was even skilled in politics.

$Rubinart's Book$
When his reputation was just beginning to improve, several knights including Feder were given the mission to raid Lunascent. The attack was later known as the "Night of Flames" or "The Disaster". That brought the fall of Lunascent. But the problem was…

$Rubinart's Book$
Feder destroyed Lunascent in the most brutal and cruel way... Some say he was so merciless that he didn't seem like a human at all. This was let known by Lunascenters who survived, and people started gossiping again about how the barbaric nature of a slave couldn't be changed.

$Rubinart's Book$
Funny how that was also the time when the engagement of Feder and the 17th Princess, Princess Elizabeth, was decided...

$Princess Elizabeth${sound:npc_Elizabeth_9561_qu_01.ogg}
Are you Knight Feder? I'm glad to finally meet you. I'm Princess Elizabeth, your fiancee.

$Knight Feder$
…(He is staring at Elizabeth without saying a word)

$Princess Elizabeth${sound:npc_Elizabeth_9561_qu_02.ogg}
…I know you're unhappy that our engagement was arranged by the royal family without your knowledge. But I'm a victim too. Our engagement ceremony will be held the day after tomorrow... Erm, I don't really want a fancy event so I requested it to be as simple as possible.

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9561_qu_01.ogg}
...I thought it would be you who would be unhappy with such arrangements. I guess I was wrong. I don't care who I'll marry. How long can a relationship last when it wasn't decided by ourselves...?(Feder takes a deep breath like he's about to say something)

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9561_qu_02.ogg}
...A noble highness like you shouldn't be tied down by a knight with a humble background. Please live freely and you can leave me whenever you want. I'm not expecting to join the royal family with marriage, or use you as a weapon against the royal family.

$Princess Elizabeth${sound:npc_Elizabeth_9561_qu_03.ogg}
Oh please do. Since I'm here, you can make use of me all you want.
You don't know how much I waited for this day to come.

$Knight Feder$
…….

$Princess Elizabeth${sound:npc_Elizabeth_9561_qu_04.ogg}
Knight Feder… Well, I'll just call you Feder since I'm your fiancee. Feder, haven't you heard about me? I'm the Forget-me-not Princess of the cabin covered with weeds... I'm the only princess who's named after a common flower not a precious jewel. I'm no different from you. And your slave past is just a past, it's a knight who's standing in front of me right now.

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9561_qu_03.ogg}
…(Feder laughs as if he thinks she's spouting nonsense)Haven't you heard the rumours about me? How murderous and inhumane Feder is? I was born in Lunascent, yet I destroyed my homeland. I'm the mad knight who was standing at the center of piled dead bodies!!

$Princess Elizabeth$
…Oh yes, Feder. You did tear Lunascent into pieces. But other knights do cruel things too. But they just threaten the people or bribe them to keep their mouths shut. But you didn't do that. It would have been easy for you if you wanted to. Strange, isn't it?

$Knight Feder$
…!!!

$Princess Elizabeth${sound:npc_Elizabeth_9561_qu_05.ogg}
Tell me where in this continent the flames of war are not blazing?
All the knights remaining in this country are murderers who kill in the name of honour. With bribes and corruption of top of all that... Gosh! This "honour" is so sickening!

$Princess Elizabeth$
So I just ignored bad rumours about you because they were only about the Lunascent incident. But I also heard many good things about you, and I can see right now that you're not so much different from what I expected. I think you are a man who can be trusted.

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9561_qu_04.ogg}
What good rumours could be there about me?

$Princess Elizabeth${sound:npc_Elizabeth_9561_qu_06.ogg}
ou built houses for the homeless, gave land for the poor so that no one would starve, and you've also made special laws to make the people in your land enjoy the fairness of the judicial system.

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9561_qu_05.ogg}
…Well that's what a lord ought to do… No country can exist without its people. It's only the right thing to do why are you...

$Princess Elizabeth${sound:npc_Elizabeth_9561_qu_07.ogg}
(Elizabeth cuts in)I'm saying this because you're the only one in this country who's doing the right thing. Do you know what's happening in this continent? There are many who wish to become the king, but there's no one who's fit to be one... Except you!

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9561_qu_06.ogg}
……Are you suggesting I kill your father, unify the continent, and become the king?

$Princess Elizabeth${sound:npc_Elizabeth_9561_qu_08.ogg}
He's still my father so I hope you can spare his life.
Keeping him alive would be useful in getting the support of the people too. That's what I think.
By the way, this isn't a suggestion. I'm trying to make a deal here.(Elizabeth smiles)

$Princess Elizabeth${sound:npc_Elizabeth_9561_qu_09.ogg}
If you vow to become the king by unifying this continent, and live to achieve your goal,
I, Princess Elizabeth, will help you with all means. Like I said before, you can use me and my name in whatever way you want.

$Princess Elizabeth$
(Elizabeth politely vows and waits for his reply. It looks like she's firm on making Feder the king)

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9561_qu_07.ogg}
……You're unbelievable. What a princess! Hahahahahaha!!!
I've never seen a princess who says such things, you're terrifying!!
Please, my princess. It is me who should pay you my respects...

$Knight Feder$
(Feder kneels down on one knee and kisses her hand. Elizabeth blushes a little.)

$Knight Feder${sound:npc_Pether_9561_qu_08.ogg}
This is an apology for my rudeness earlier on.
Won't you accept the apology of your knight and your fiance?

$Princess Elizabeth${sound:npc_Elizabeth_9561_qu_10.ogg}
(Elizabeth doesn't even try to hide the delight shown clearly on her face)
Of course! Shall we discuss about our engagement ceremony tomorrow then?

$Rubinart's Book$
After that, the rumours about Feder started to change drastically. No matter how Feder wielded his sword across the continent, Elizabeth was there to support him. Now, his lowly past was no longer a shameful blotch, but something that triggered sympathy and awe. Feder's reputation spread, and more and more people started streaming into his land. The king, the knights... naturally everyone started noticing him.

$Rubinart's Book$
But humans just love to crush the budding sprouts when they see one.

$Rubinart's Book$
They gave Feder a ridiculous mission to conquer Anu Arendel. At that time, Anu Arendel was an unknown land shrouded in mystery. There was practically no interaction between the Elves and the humans.

$Rubinart's Book$
But he wouldn't be called the Conqueror King now if he couldn't solve that.

$Rubinart's Book$
Oh, I'm running out of pages to write. I should look for another empty notebook.
If you're curious about what happened next... Hmm... Search nearby. The next book should be at a corridor, my friend.
(The book stops here. Talk to Geraint)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I would be a Heraldry Scholar if I knew that.</html>
<html>Erm... Anu Arendel couldn't have fallen under Feder... Could it?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
…What?? That's it?? So... what happened to Anu Arendel? Do you know?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But it has nothing to do with where Feder is.</html>
<html>I have no time to study history now.</html>
<html>Yeah, but we don't have much time....</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
…You don't know? Then what do you know?!
Oh right. If I remember the smell of this book, I can sniff out where the sequel is...! The same guy wrote it.
Huhu, am I smart or what? Don't you agree, stupid {user_nick}?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Who are you?! You're not the Geraint I know!!!</html>
<html>Huh??? Who are you?! I don't know anyone or any dragon like you!!</html>
<html>That's right, but I didn't expect that to come from you!!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
…Think about it. This guy called Rubinart is writing about Feder. And history starts from the past and it eventually comes to the present. Though this record may not reach the present day, if we can find out the information of the time that is the closest to where we are now, it would be easier for us to find out where Feder is. Hey... why are you looking at me like that?

$Geraint$
What nonsense…!(Geraint looks like he doesn't understand... and soon rolls his eyes after finally getting what you're saying)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Erm... (Not exactly to the extent of extreme stupidity...)</html>
<html>Eh... (Well, his common sense was...)</html>
<html>Eek... (Or was he really a dimwit? I'm confused here)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9561_qu_08.ogg}
?!?!?!?? Did you take me for a fool?? This is common sense!!
Was the past me that you're so longingly wanting to see a dimwit without common sense or what?

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9561_qu_09.ogg}
Hey... why are you looking at me like that...? (Geraint stares suspiciously. Try shaking it off. Protect his childly innocence.)
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9561_qu_10.ogg}
Hmph whatever. Let's follow the smell. I don't care if the past me was a stupid fool. I'm not so keep that in mind!! (Though you don't know how Geraint understood what you meant, go to the Corridor of Tangled Memories)

journal.title: The Princess and the Knight 1
journal.contents:
Talk to Geraint.

Anu Arendel - Geraint
journal.destination: Talk to Geraint in Anu Arendel

journal.title: The Princess and the Knight 2
journal.contents:
You've decided to follow the map and go to the "Crossroad of Hesitant Past" first.
Off you go to the Crossroad of Hesitant Past.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Crossroad of Hesitant Past
journal.destination: To the Crossroad of Hesitant Past
journal.todo_msg: Go to the Crossroad of Hesitant Past.

journal.title: The Princess and the Knight 3
journal.contents:
You've found Red Dragon Rubinart's book….!
Why did he leave such a thing behind? Try reading it first.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Crossroad of Hesitant Past (Rubinart's Book)
journal.destination: Read Rubinart's Book at the Crossroad of Hesitant Past

journal.title: The Princess and the Knight 4
journal.contents:
You've finished reading Rubinart's Book.
It was about Feder and his fiancee Elizabeth…
It looks like his fiancee had a lot to do with making Feder the Conqueror King.
Talk to Geraint.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Crossroad of Hesitant Past (Geraint)
journal.destination: Talk to Geraint at Crossroad of Hesitant Past.
